summary.span: 用作一组仅在某些相关页面显示模式中出现的帮助器区域的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for a set of helper zones that appear only in certain associated page display modes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集，在区域是包含服务器控件，并提供一致的用户界面 (UI) 包含控件的模块化布局的网页上的区域。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a region on a Web page that contains server controls, and provides modular layout with a consistent user interface (UI) for the contained controls. 有两种常规类型的派生自基类的区域控件类：区域和区域。There are two general types of zone controls that derive from the base class: zones and zones. 区域包含服务器控件 (可以是自定义控件或其他服务器控件包括 ASP.NET 控件和用户控件)。The zones contain server controls (which can be custom controls, or other server controls including ASP.NET controls and user controls). 这些控件构成网页上的主 UI，并且为所有可能的显示模式中可见，除非它们处于隐藏状态以编程方式或用户。These controls form the primary UI of a Web page and are visible in all the possible display modes, unless they are hidden programmatically or by a user. 区域作为特殊的帮助器区域显示仅当页面处于与该区域，某些显示模式，而且这些区域还包含使用户能够修改布局、 外观、 属性和内容的特殊的服务器控件通过网页浏览器中。The zones are special helper zones that appear only when a page is in certain display modes associated with the zone, and these zones also contain special server controls that enable users to modify the layout, appearance, properties, and content of Web pages from within a browser. 开发人员可以继承自基类类，或任何派生区域，以创建自定义区域。Developers can inherit from the base class, or any of the derived zones, to create custom zones. Web 部件控件集包含三种类型的区域下, 表中所述。The Web Parts control set contains three types of zones, described in the following table. |工具区域类型Tool zone type|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||包含控件用于编辑和页面上的服务器控件属性。Contains controls used to edit and server control properties on a page.| ||包含控件，又包含用户可以添加到页面的控件。Contains controls, which in turn contain controls that users can add to a page.| ||不包含声明性标记元素;此区域是独立的。Does not contain declarative markup elements; this zone is self-contained. 在运行时，它将呈现一个特殊的用户界面，使用户能够管理之间的连接控件。At run time, it renders a special UI that enables users to manage connections between controls.| 基类提供了方法和属性都适用于派生区域。The base class provides methods and properties that are useful to derived zones. 它包含和方法，重写基方法从类，并呈现按钮和页眉和页脚区域的其他用户界面特性。It contains and methods, which override the base methods from the class, and render buttons and other UI attributes for the header and footer of a zone. 用于处理谓词，用户可以执行各种区域中的常见 UI 操作也有多个成员。There are also several members for handling verbs, which are common UI actions that users can perform in the various zones. 与处理谓词相关的成员包括： ， ，和。Members related to handling verbs include: , , and . 包含两个重载的方法，添加对象添加到集合。The contains two overloaded methods, which add objects to the collection. 此集合关联的显示模式确定哪些显示模式将与特定类型的区域 （换而言之，它将确定哪些显示模式在区域是可见）。This collection of associated display modes determines which display modes are related to a particular type of zone (in other words, it determines in which display modes a zone is visible). 所有关联的联合所有显示模式在给定的网页上的区域确定 （除了正常浏览模式中） 的显示模式还可能有或在页面上受支持。The union of all associated display modes for all the zones on a given Web page determines which display modes (besides the normal browse mode) are possible or supported on the page. 中包含的页的受支持的显示模式的集合属性。The collection of supported display modes for a page is contained in the property. > [!NOTE] > 在任何给定时间，只有一个显示模式可以处于活动状态页上。At any given time, only one display mode can be active on a page. 在中引用当前处于活动状态的显示模式属性。The currently active display mode is referenced in the property. 类还包含大量的样式属性包含区域的各种 UI 元素的样式特性。The class also contains a number of style properties that contain style attributes for the various UI elements of a zone. 某些样式属性包括， ， ，和。Some style properties include , , , and .

span.span: The Web Parts control set contains the specialized zones listed above in the Remarks section, and you can often derive from one of them to add custom behavior to a zone.

para.span: 但是，区域的呈现编程更灵活地控制，你应从直接继承类。

para.span: 例如，你可能想要创建专用的任务，如搜索区域自定义的分区。

span.span: For example, you might want to create a custom zone for a specialized task, such as a search zone.

para.span: 若要创建一个自定义区域，你可以重写任何虚拟成员来完全自定义呈现，或者你可以重写只有特定成员。

span.span: To create a custom zone, you can override any of the virtual members to fully customize the rendering, or you can override only a specific member.

para.span: 或者，也可以创建自定义显示模式为你的时区通过继承类，但这不是必需。

span.span: Optionally, you can also create a custom display mode for your zone by inheriting from the class, but this is not required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类重写基属性要考虑两个基属性的值和的值属性。The class overrides the base property to consider both the value of the base property and the value of the property. 如果这两个属性值设置为`true`，则属性返回的值`true`，并且控件将在页上可见。If both property values are set to `true`, then the property returns a value of `true`, and the control is visible on the page. 如果两个属性值都`false`、属性返回的值`false`，控件是不可见。If either property value is `false`, the property returns a value of `false`, and the control is not visible. > [!IMPORTANT] > 属性只能在设计器中，如 Microsoft Visual Studio 设计器的设计时分配。The property can only be assigned at design time in a designer, such as the Microsoft Visual Studio designer. 如果尝试以编程方式设置属性，将引发异常。If you attempt to set the property programmatically, an exception is thrown. 此属性在可视化设计器，可绑定并非是可在运行时绑定。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .
